column3:
OS X before & after, the background is now a yellowish colour vs the original grey.
![modal-grey](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/19101859/1fd2298c-8afe-11e6-8425-c68e84628fbb.png)
![modal-yellow](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/19101862/208a0d5e-8afe-11e6-9f89-51e6b40676ff.png)

> OS X before & after, the background is now a yellowish colour vs the original grey.

Tooltip-yellow! Like sticking a post-it over the interface.

Going to test this, as I have a somewhat unconventional theme.

Before:
![untitled1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/126646/19105171/edb65558-8ae0-11e6-9780-f36724e11a08.png)

After:
![untitled2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com

Uh, the colours used are tooltip-text on tooltip-bg. You have white-on-white tooltips?? :/

I don't know anything about corners... saw something in the stylesheet, but it didn't seem to do anything?
Same problem as @laanwj  on default fedora skin. Also, we should make sure gitian builds work fine with it.\n
I saw the PR for this overlay yet I have yet to see it on my running bitcoin-qt . How do I make this appear please?\n

Leave your node (presumably testnet) offline for a few days, then when you start it, prevent it from syncing entirely by stopping it after it fetches headers, then start it again with -connect=0 to prevent it from getting connections.\n

> Uh, the colours used are tooltip-text on tooltip-bg. You have white-on-white tooltips?? :/

Tooltips are white on grey, just like everything else.
![untitled](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/126646/19685911/1b6645ec-9abf-11e6-959e-fc21c6e1ae58.png)
There's no canary-yellow in my theme at all.

> I don't know anything about corners... saw something in the stylesheet, but it didn'
Will get back to this later\n
@MarcoFalke Do your tooltips work? Can you investigate why you seem to have white-on-white palette here?
Going to close this for now. Seems there are still issues to solve with the yellow-tooltip colouring. Can revisit when some more research has been done.

These look sweet in my Plasma Breeze and Plasma Breeze Dark themes. No matter if wallet is opened or not, all 4 combinations are as good with this as in the master tip d67330d112.

It doesn't build on my system right away because of some Qt dependency mismatch I was lazy to investigate, but merge/rebase conflicts to master tip d67330d112 are easy<sup>\[1\]</sup>.

<sub>\[1\]: I actually me
